title: RIOT, can you help me with something?
body:
So I've been having the toughest time in ranked after making Silver III several months ago.
Recently, I've been trying to take up ranked, and you can see from my w/l ratio thing, I haven't been doing so well.
I dropped to Silver V like a brick.
Anyway, I'm playing because it's fun, and I know for sure I'm improving as an individual. I just have the worst luck sometimes.
>>>MAIN POINT: (refer to attachment) Can you please forgive this loss? I lost 17 points for it. It's absurd. 2v5? Gotta be kidding me.
Look, I love this game and all, but I hate the people so much for the most part.

replies.body: that's not how loss forgiven works.

I know. It's disgusting.
After provisionals, I was 6/4
But then things happened.

> [{quoted}](name=Januarius1111,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MAAvfJAx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-22T10:08:37.252+0000)
>
> I know. It's disgusting.
> After provisionals, I was 6/4
> But then things happened.

Their adc had 74cs at 20 mins.. 74 GODDAMN CS AT 20 MINS..
